attributes.author: auto-annotation
attributes.text: This alert was generated due to fast flood detection. The 'Total Traffic' host alert signature has been triggered at router 'Traffic-PCAP-CentOS'. (expected rate: 5 bps/50.00 Kpps, observed rate: 11 bps/0 pps)
